00007 #include "mexopencv.hpp"
00008 using namespace std;
00009 using namespace cv;

00018 void mexFunction( int nlhs, mxArray *plhs[],
00019                   int nrhs, const mxArray *prhs[] )
00020 {
00021     // Check the number of arguments
00022     if (nrhs<2 || ((nrhs%2)!=0) || nlhs>1)
00023         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00024     
00025     // Argument vector
00026     vector<MxArray> rhs(prhs,prhs+nrhs);
00027     
00028     Mat prevImg(rhs[0].toMat(CV_8U)), nextImg(rhs[1].toMat(CV_8U));
00029     Mat flow;
00030     double pyrScale=0.5;
00031     int levels=1;
00032     int winsize=3;
00033     int iterations=10;
00034     int polyN=5;
00035     double polySigma=1.1;
00036     int flags=0;
00037     for (int i=2; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00038         string key = rhs[i].toString();
00039         if (key=="InitialFlow") {
00040             flow = rhs[i+1].toMat(CV_32F);
00041             flags |= OPTFLOW_USE_INITIAL_FLOW;
00042         }
00043         else if (key=="PyrScale")
00044             pyrScale = rhs[i+1].toDouble();
00045         else if (key=="Levels")
00046             levels = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00047         else if (key=="WinSize")
00048             winsize = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00049         else if (key=="Iterations")
00050             iterations = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00051         else if (key=="PolyN")
00052             polyN = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00053         else if (key=="PolySigma")
00054             polySigma = rhs[i+1].toDouble();
00055         else if (key=="Gaussian")
00056             flags |= OPTFLOW_FARNEBACK_GAUSSIAN;
00057         else
00058             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00059     }
00060     
00061     // Process
00062     calcOpticalFlowFarneback(prevImg, nextImg, flow, pyrScale, levels, winsize,
00063         iterations, polyN, polySigma, flags);
00064     plhs[0] = MxArray(flow);
00065 }
